component.name: AI Rules Generator
component.summary: Generate comprehensive AI coding assistant rules

description.p: AI Rules Generator is a powerful CLI tool that creates customized AI coding assistant rules based on your project configuration and best practices.

ul.li: Interactive Setup: Configure once, use everywhere
Multi-Tool Support: Generates rules for 6 AI coding tools (Cursor, Claude Code, Windsurf, GitHub Copilot, Warp, Janie)
Shared AI Rules: Creates .ai-rules/ directory as single source of truth
Multiple AI Providers: Support for OpenAI and Anthropic Claude models
Monorepo Support: Automatically detects and generates rules for each package
Language & Framework Specific: Tailored rules for 20+ languages and 100+ frameworks
Template Fallback: Works without AI API keys using template-based generation
Multi-tool support for 6 AI coding assistants
Support for OpenAI and Anthropic Claude models
